name: Tech Tool Store License File
summary: Learn about .TTSKEY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: There are several ways to activate Tech Tool Store:
You can activate it by pasting your license text in the text box under the "License activation" group.
Click Settings in the lower right pane, click the License tab, click Browse, locate the license, and select Activate by file.
Place the TTSKEY file in the same directory as the Tech Tool Store .EXE file.

description: A TTSKEY file is a license file used by Tech Tool Store, an application that comes with a large collection of IT tools. It contains a license, which consists of a string of random letters and numbers. TTSKEY files are used to activate the Tech Tool Store application.
